selection1.name:
खुदा से क्या मांगू तुम्हारे वास्ते,
सदा खुशियाँ हो तुम्हारे रास्ते,
हंसी तुम्हारे चेहरे पर रहे कुछ इस तरह,
खुशबू फूल का साथ निभाए जिस तरह !
हैप्पी क्रिसमस

No Greeting Card to Give
No Sweet Flowers to Send
No Cute Graphics to Forward
Just A LOVING HEART
Saying “HAPPY X’MAS”

My Christmas message
Wrapped with love and happiness
Saying thank you Mom & Dad
For your support the whole year through
Now relax, you deserve the best.

इस क्रिसमस आपका जीवन क्रिसमस ट्री की तरह,
हरा भरा और भविष्य तारों की तरह चमचमाता रहे!
हैप्पी क्रिसमस

क्रिसमस का यह प्यारा त्यौहार जीवन में,
लाये खुशियाँ अपार, सांता क्लॉस आये आपके द्वार,
यह शुभकामना हमारी करें स्वीकार ,
हैप्पी मेरी क्रिसमस

चाँद ने अपनी चांदनी बिखेरी है,
और तारों ने आसमान को सजाया है,
लेकर तौफा अमन और प्यार का,
देखो स्वर्ग से कोई फ़रिश्ता आया है,
हैप्पी मेरी क्रिसमस 2019

गुल ने गुलशन से गुलफाम भेजा है,
सितारों ने आसमान से सलाम भेजा है
मुबारक हो आपको क्रिसमस का यह प्यारा त्यौहार
हमने आपको यह पैगाम भेजा है|

Another day, another month, another Christmas
Another winter, another smile, another year,
May special memories brighten your Christmas
May the joy of Christmas be with you forever.

Devdoot banke koi aayega,
Saari aashayein tumhari,
Poori karke jaayega,
Christmas ke is shubh din par
Tohfe khushiyo ke de jayega.

A little smile, A word of cheer,
A bit of love from someone near
A little gift from one held dear,
Best wishes for the coming year
These make a Merry Christmas.

Na card bhej raha hun,
Na koi phool bhej raha hun
Sirf sache dil se mein aap ko
Christmas aur nav varsh ke
Shubhkamana bhej raha hun.

क्रिसमस आया क्रिसमस आया,
बच्चों का है मन ललचाया।
सैंटाक्लॉज आएंगे, नए खिलौने लाएंगे।
सैंटाक्लॉज ने दी आवाज, एनी आओ,
पेनी आओ, जॉनी आओ, जॉन आओ,
यीशु की ये याद का दिन है,
बच्चों का ये प्यार का दिन है।

X’Mas is magic
Bringing families together
Sharing beats of love
Laughter and lots of happiness
Longing to see you at Christmas.

Baccho ka din, tohfon ka din
Santa aayega kuch tumhe deke jayega
Bhul na jana use shukriya kehna
Yahi saadgi ishu saa sikhayega!

I wish you joy all though your holidays,
I wish you good luck that forever stays.
I wish you the love of family and friends,
I wish you happy days that never ever ends.

Khuda se kya maangu tere waste
Sada khushiyo se bhare ho tere jeevan k raste
Hansi tere chehre pe rahe is tarah
Khushboo phool ka sathh nibhati hai jis tarah.

Silent night silvery snow
Evergreen tree bright and a glow
Christmas is here bringing good cheer
May it bring for you
Gifts of love and joy too!

Sabke Dilo mein ho sabke liye Pyar,
Aanewala har din laye khusiyo ka Tyohar,
Is ummid ka sath aao bhulke sare Gum
Christmas me hum sab kare WEL-COME!

X’mas is love,
X’mas is dedication,
X’mas is happiness.
Happy X-MAS to you
And your family with a
Bunch of love and prayers.

Chand ne apni chandani bikheri hain
Aur taro ne aasma ko sajaya hain
Lekar taufa aman aur pyaar ka.
Dekho Swarg se koi farishta aaya hai

A Christmas candle is a lovely thing
It makes no noise at all,
But softly gives itself away
While quite unselfish, it grows small.

Prabhu ishu ke pavitra parva
Christmas ki aap sabhi ko badhai.
Parmeshwar k pavitra-marg ka
Anusharan karein wo sadaiv saath hai,
Apne bando ki sir pr uska hmesha hath h

May this Christmas bring you closer to God
May you be able to understand the love that
He has for you in a more better manner.
May baby Jesus stay with you forever….!!

Christmas ka ye pyara sa tyohaar
Jeevan me laye khushiyan apaar
Santa clause aayee aapke dwar
Subhkamna hamari kare sweekar.

May baby Jesus bring you
And your family lots of love.
May the host of angels
Fill your life with joy and bliss.
Merry Christmas to you
And all your loved ones.

Lo Aa gaya jis ka tha intezaar,
Sab mil ke bolo mere yaar,
December me laya Christmas bahaar
Mubarak ho tumko Christmas mere yaar

Holds your hand when your scared.
Makes you smile when you’re down,
Hugs you when you need comfort,
And buys you gifts during CHRISTMAS!!

Aapki aankho mein saje ho jo bhi sapne
Aur dil mein chupi ho jo bhi abhilashaye
Ye Christmas ka parv unhe sach kar jaye
Aap ke liye hai humari yhi shubhkamnaye

I wish you Lovely X-mas
I wish you Favorable ”
I wish you Enjoyable ”
You shall not Lack in this X-mas
The Lord shall provide to you.

Christmas  aye ban kar ujaala,
Khul jaaye aap ki kismat ka tala,
Hmesha tum pe meherban rahe upar wala,
Bas itni c dua krta hai apka ye chahne wala.

I hope this Christmas enriches your life,
May each day be happy & bright,
Overflowing with pleasure & love,
May your Christmas be filled with delight..!!
